Expected Outcome: User receives verification email and account status is "Unverified".

Pre-condition: Valid registration data and ID document
Expected Outcome: ID document is validated via OCR and user status is "Pending Verification".
Account status changes to "Verified" and user can login.
Owner account status changes to "Verified Owner" and can add bikes.
Store is created with location coordinates and geofence radius.
Address is validated and coordinates are stored for geofencing.
New bike appears in browse/search results for renters.

Pre-condition: Bike is available and dates are valid
Expected Outcome: Booking status is "Pending" and payment prompt appears.
Payment is processed booking status changes to "Approved" and booking is confirmed.
Booking status is "Pending" and owner receives cash payment request notification.
Booking status changes to "Active" and rental time starts.
Location tracking starts and renter can share location with owner.
Renter location is tracked and geofence violations are monitored.

Pre-condition: Active booking and valid phone number
Expected Outcome: Renter receives SMS alert and owner receives in-app notification.

Pre-condition: Active booking within 10 minutes of end
Expected Outcome: Renter receives SMS reminder and owner is notified.
Renter receives overdue SMS alert and owner receives notification.
Renter can submit rating and review for the bike.
Rating and review appear on bike details page.
Rating reflects on owner's public profile and average rating updates.
Owner status changes to "Verified Owner" and can list bikes.
User cannot login and account is marked as suspended.
Bike becomes searchable and visible in renter app.
Bike becomes unsearchable in renter app.
Bike status reverts to "Available" and dates become available.
Renter receives rejection notification and booking status changes to "Rejected".
Renter receives approval notification and booking status changes to "Approved".
Booking status changes to "Active" and rental time starts immediately.
Nearby bikes list reflects updated location and search radius.
Owner sees live location update on Track Renters page.
Owner sees new request in My Bikes page and receives popup notification.
6-digit OTP is generated and sent via SMS.
Phone number is verified and user can proceed with booking.
OCR extracts text and validates ID document format.
Address is validated and coordinates are returned for geofencing.
Geofence radius is configured and used for violation monitoring.
GeofencingBackgroundService starts monitoring the booking.
System checks geofence violations and sends notifications every 2 minutes.
User is added to notification group and receives real-time updates.
Notification is broadcasted to user via SignalR and appears as popup.
Renter sees their location on map with store marker and geofence circle.
Owner sees renter's live location with bike icon marker on dedicated map page.
Booking appears in renter's and owner's booking history.
Payment appears in user's payment history with transaction details.
Verification email is sent with token and link for account activation.
Password reset email is sent with reset token and link.
Password is updated and user can login with new password.
Booking shows rating status and prevents duplicate ratings.
Owner can view separate map pages for each active renter.
Notification is added to queue and displayed one at a time.
User is redirected to booking details page and notification is marked as read.
